subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Tim Jitloff withstood a charge by the junior competitor Tommy Ford to win the giant slalom title at the United States Alpine Championships in Carrabassett Valley, Me. Jitloff led after the first run down the sun-splashed Narrow Gauge trail at Sugarloaf, then held off the 19-year-old Ford in the second run.
